name: Vlad & Niki: BMX Bike Racing
description:
Enjoy new BMX bike racing game with Vlad & Niki. Try different racing tracks and learn extreme tricks to get bonuses. Enjoy various picturesque locations and hilarious jokes in this game with famous bloggers. It is a real present for bicycle lovers.

Vlad and Niki are both ready to play with you. You can play for one character or for both of them in turns. Visit the shop where you can choose various items of equipment and make your character look unique.

Upgrade your BMX bike, change parts and make your racing skills better. Take part in competitions and win!

Please read our Privacy policy: https://policy.psvgamestudio.com/privacy_policy_appstore_clear_invest.html
and Terms of use: https://policy.psvgamestudio.com/terms_of_use_appstore_clear_invest.html
